name: cluttered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
untidy, not organized, and covered with a lot of things: a cluttered desk/room The floor is cluttered with hoses, tools and buckets. See
clutter
More examplesFewer examplesThe room was cluttered but not filthy.Our kitchen counters are always cluttered. How can I keep them looking neater?Another wall is cluttered with family photos.
